sentences.english: Gray-matter maturity, however, does not signal the end of mental change.
sentences.chinese: 然而灰質的成熟並不標誌着智力變換的終結。

sentences.english: Only in this way ca fantastic I finish the work intime.
sentences.chinese: 唯有這樣我智力及時完成職責。

sentences.english: As a special environment , education can promote the intell…
sentences.chinese: 教育作爲特殊環境，對智力發展有促進作用。

sentences.english: A child’s development, both physical and mental, is stifled by a lack of iron.
sentences.chinese: 缺鐵會阻礙兒童的身體和智力上的發育。

sentences.english: Reading is an important way to acquire knowledge as well as a basic of intelligence skill.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀是獲取知識的重要途徑，也是基本的智力技能。

sentences.english: And God gave me muscles and brains to work.
sentences.chinese: 上帝賜給我臂力和智力去工作。

sentences.english: Teng village in person every three months to make a deep mental tests.
sentences.chinese: 每三個月有騰村親自來負責做一次深度智力測試。

sentences.english: In addition, the general intelligence and mental health factors also slightly affect them.
sentences.chinese: 一般智力因素和心理健康因素也有影響但不明顯。

sentences.english: Non- intelligential factors are the necessary psychological conditions to ensure the success of all kinds of activities.
sentences.chinese: 非智力因素是保證成功進行各種活動的必要心理條件。

sentences.english: What time is Quiz Show on?
sentences.chinese: 智力競賽節目什麼時候播放？

sentences.english: No obvious change in pest-operative intelligence of the patients and few complications and sequela.
sentences.chinese: 術後智力未見明顯改變，其併發症及後遺症少。

sentences.english: Different childbirth ways have in various degree influence on children's intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 不同的分娩方式對兒童智力有不同程度的影響。

sentences.english: It's a mistake to treat intelligence as an undifferentiated whole .
sentences.chinese: 把智力當作一個無區別的整體是不正確的。

sentences.english: How would you rate intelligences where you work?
sentences.chinese: 在你工作的地方，你會如何提升智力呢？
